Text:
hell yeah...I remember being at an 'old book' shop (half priced or less, for used books) and picking up the 'anus clenching adventure', but I couldn't buy it coz the shopkeeper had already sold it and was just keeping the comic till the customer came back for it! You can imagine how pissed I was. I tried to persuade the shopkeeper to sell it to me, for a better price even, but he wouldn't budge :)

so thanks for bringing this to me finally, even in digital format.
